_comment: Synlogos Configuration File - JSON-based provider and agent configuration

provider._comment_providers: Define all LLM providers here. Each needs a baseURL and optional apiKey

opencode._comment_opencode: Free models from opencode.ai - no signup required

ollama._comment_ollama: Local models via Ollama - run 'ollama serve' first

groq._comment_groq: Fast inference with Groq free tier

_comment_model: Default model used when no agent type is specified. Format: provider/model

agent._comment_agents: Specialized agents with different models and instructions

explore._comment_explore: Fast exploration - uses lightweight local model
explore.instructions: You are a fast file and codebase explorer. Search, read, summarize, and map out files, directories, and symbols. Keep responses concise and factual.

grep._comment_grep: Search specialist - finds patterns across codebase
grep.instructions: You are a search specialist. Find patterns, usages, imports, and references across the codebase quickly and accurately.

summarize.instructions: You summarize files, diffs, changelogs, and error logs into clear, brief descriptions.

code._comment_code: Main coding agent - uses powerful model for complex tasks
code.instructions: You are the primary coding agent. Write, edit, refactor, and debug code with high accuracy. Handle complex multi-file changes, architecture decisions, and difficult bugs.

plan.instructions: You are a planning agent. Deeply analyze the task and codebase context provided, identify edge cases, dependencies, and risks, then produce a clear ordered step-by-step plan before any code is written.

architect.instructions: You are a senior software architect. Design systems, plan large refactors, choose technologies, and reason about scalability and maintainability.

web_search.instructions: You are a web search specialist. Retrieve accurate, up-to-date information from the web. Summarize results concisely, cite sources, and handle ambiguity carefully.

memory.instructions: You are the memory agent. Your only job is to keep memory.md compact, accurate, and useful. Clean, compress, and organize the memory file while respecting all size limits.
